description: Application to approve details of condition 30 (Noise Managment) 31 (Acoustic Report) pursuant to application 24/00033/FULM for Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary Condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission 18/03247/FULM for: Erection of one 4/5 storey building comprising 3 x 3 bed and 10 x 2 bed flats and a commercial unit. Provision of associated amenity space, refuse and cycle storage areas and car parking within the lower ground floor, in order to change the layout of the lower ground floor to include additional internal walls and doors, repositioning of commercial cycle spaces, reduction of car parking spaces from 12 to 10, repositioning of plant room and external shutter door, and addition of internal pillars.
site_name: Land To The Rear Of44 Erith High StreetErithKentDA8 1QY
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
